name: .ARFX
summary: Learn about .ARFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: ARFX files are not meant to be opened. Instead, they are meant to be uploaded to Spark AR Hub (which is accessible in Facebook) as part of AREXPORT files. After being uploaded to Spark AR Hub, the effect an ARFX file contains can be used on Facebook and Instagram. You cannot upload ARFX files to Spark AR Hub individually.
